title: Angular SubModule Options Schema
description: Creates a new sub-module for Angular library in the given or default project.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the sub-module?

path.description: The path at which to create the sub-module files, relative to the current workspace. Default is a folder with the same name as the sub-module in the project root.

generateComponent.description: Should a default component be generated for a sub-module? (If yes, module will always be generated too)

generateModule.description: Should a default module be generated for a sub-module?

style.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for component style files.

inlineStyle.description: When true, includes styles inline in the component.ts file. Only CSS styles can be included inline. By default, an external styles file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

inlineTemplate.description: When true, includes template inline in the component.ts file. By default, an external template file is created and referenced in the component.ts file.

skipTests.description: When true, does not create "spec.ts" test files for the new component.
